name: Animate!
description: A tiny animation tool with an EGA palette :) Icons: frame backward, set end frame, frame forward, onion skin (previous frame ghosted), save frame as png, save / load data as json (select all + copy / paste from text fields then click icon), clear (click 3 times to clear project), play / stop. Click and drag or just click for dots. Clear dot by clicking with the same color. 3 clicks of a color fills the frame, 4 clicks clears the frame :) May need to run locally for frame export. By @LorenBednar
